text: RT-qPCR was used to determine gene expression levels of <extra_id_0> il-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> cxcl8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in response to PMA following inhibition of NF-kappaB , JNK and PKC .

text: The following primer sequences were used , <extra_id_0> il-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : forward - TGTGAAAGCAGCAAAGAGGCACTG , reverse - ACAGCTCTGGCTTGTTCCTCACTA ; <extra_id_0> cxcl8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : forward - ACCACACTGCGCCAACACAGAAAT , reverse - AAACTTCTCCACAACCCTCTGCAC .
Thermocycling conditions for CYBR Green ( Quanta , USA ) consisted of a denaturation step for 10 min at 95 degreesC followed by 60 cycles of 95degreesC for 1s and 60degreesC for 30s .
Gene expression was analysed using Stratagene ( Mx3000p ( TM ) ) ( AH diagnostics ) .
The obtained Ct values were normalized against 18S .
Initially , all measured 18S Ct values were used to calculate a mean Ct value that was used to determine the deltaCt values for each sample .
Gene expression patterns for <extra_id_0> il-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> cxcl8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were then normalized with regard to the samples 18S deltaCt .
